name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with meat sauce.
instructions: Boil spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté onions and garlic in olive oil.
Add ground beef and brown it.
Stir in tomatoes and season with herbs and spices.
Simmer the sauce until it thickens.
Serve the sauce over cooked spaghetti.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: Healthy salad with grilled chicken, mixed greens, and vinaigrette.
instructions: Grill chicken until cooked through.
Toss mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion in a bowl.
Slice grilled chicken and place on top of the salad.
Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette.
Serve immediately.

name: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
description: Colorful stir-fried vegetables with tofu and soy sauce.
instructions: Press and cube tofu.
Stir-fry tofu and vegetables in a pan.
Add soy sauce and toss until well combined.
Serve hot.

name: Salmon Quinoa Bowl
description: Nourishing bowl with grilled salmon, quinoa, and roasted vegetables.
instructions: Grill salmon and cook quinoa separately.
Roast zucchini and cherry tomatoes with olive oil.
Assemble the bowl with salmon, quinoa, and roasted vegetables.
Squeeze lemon over the top.
Enjoy!

name: Penne Arrabbiata
description: Spicy Italian pasta dish with penne and tomato sauce.
instructions: Cook penne pasta al dente.
Sauté garlic and red chili flakes in olive oil.
Add tomatoes and simmer to make the sauce.
Toss penne in the spicy tomato sauce.
Garnish with fresh basil.

name: Turkey and Avocado Wrap
description: Satisfying wrap with turkey, avocado, lettuce, and whole-grain tortilla.
instructions: Spread mayonnaise on the tortilla.
Layer turkey, avocado, lettuce, and tomato.
Roll up the wrap tightly.
Slice and serve.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Italian risotto with mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Sauté mushrooms and onions in a pan.
Add Arborio rice and stir until translucent.
Pour in white wine and let it evaporate.
Gradually add vegetable broth, stirring until absorbed.
Finish with Parmesan cheese.

name: Chickpea and Spinach Curry
description: Vegetarian curry with chickpeas, spinach, and aromatic spices.
instructions: Sauté onions in a pan with curry spices.
Add tomatoes, chickpeas, and coconut milk.
Simmer until chickpeas are tender.
Stir in fresh spinach until wilted.
Serve over rice.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Classic Italian salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella cheese.
Arrange on a plate with fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Enjoy!

name: Shrimp and Broccoli Stir-Fry
description: Quick and flavorful stir-fry with shrimp, broccoli, and soy sauce.
instructions: Sauté garlic and ginger in a pan.
Add shrimp and stir-fry until pink.
Toss in broccoli and bell peppers.
Pour soy sauce over the mixture.
Serve hot.

name: Quinoa and Black Bean Bowl
description: Protein-packed bowl with quinoa, black beans, corn, and salsa.
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Combine quinoa with black beans and corn.
Top with diced avocado and salsa.
Garnish with fresh cilantro.
Enjoy!

name: Grilled Salmon
description: A light and flavorful dish featuring perfectly grilled salmon fillets topped with a zesty lemon-dill sauce. This meal is not only delicious but also packed with healthy omega-3 fatty acids
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat
Garnish with lemon zest and fresh dill, Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious Grilled Salmon with Lemon-Dill Sauce!
Preheat the grill to medium-high heat
Garnish with lemon zest and fresh dill, Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious Grilled Salmon with Lemon-Dill Sauce!
